publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3069 Patricia Ferguson: Time for Mugabe to Go—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the growing humanitarian crisis in Zimbabwe; considers the situation to be so severe that only a change in leadership and the restoration of democracy can begin to tackle the problems faced by Zimbabwe’s people, and calls on the international community to apply pressure to the country’s president, Robert Mugabe, to stand aside and make way for the democratic forces in Zimbabwe to begin the process of rebuilding their nation.

S3M-3069 Time for Mugabe to Go (lodged on 9 December 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, John Park*, Andy Kerr*, Bill Butler*, Alex Neil*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Mary Mulligan*, Marlyn Glen*, Elaine Murray*, Pauline McNeill*, Helen Eadie*, Jackie Baillie*, George Foulkes*

S3M-3069 Time for Mugabe to Go (lodged on 9 December 2008) Ken Macintosh*, Trish Godman*, Des McNulty*, Bill Kidd*, Alasdair Allan*, Bob Doris*, Stuart McMillan*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Kenneth Gibson*, Joe FitzPatrick*, Robin Harper*, Ross Finnie*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Liam McArthur*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Christina McKelvie*, Patrick Harvie*, Sandra White*

S3M-3069 Patricia Ferguson: Time for Mugabe to Go—That the Parliament notes with grave concern the growing humanitarian crisis in Zimbabwe; considers the situation to be so severe that only a change in leadership and the restoration of democracy can begin to tackle the problems faced by Zimbabwe’s people, and calls on the international community to apply pressure to the country’s president, Robert Mugabe, to stand aside and make way for the democratic forces in Zimbabwe to begin the process of rebuilding their nation. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, John Park, Andy Kerr, Bill Butler, Alex Neil, Mr Frank McAveety, Mary Mulligan, Marlyn Glen, Elaine Murray, Pauline McNeill, Helen Eadie, Jackie Baillie, George Foulkes, Ken Macintosh, Trish Godman, Des McNulty, Bill Kidd, Alasdair Allan, Bob Doris, Stuart McMillan, Bashir Ahmad, Rob Gibson, Kenneth Gibson, Joe FitzPatrick, Robin Harper, Ross Finnie, Hugh O’Donnell, Liam McArthur, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Christina McKelvie, Patrick Harvie, Sandra White, Gil Paterson*
S3M-3069 Time for Mugabe to Go (lodged on 9 December 2008) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3069 Time for Mugabe to Go (lodged on 9 December 2008) Cathy Peattie*
S3M-3069 Time for Mugabe to Go (lodged on 9 December 2008) Karen Gillon*
S3M-3069 Time for Mugabe to Go (lodged on 9 December 2008) Tom McCabe*
